mapper.select: select userId from consumer where id = ${id}
select count(userId) from consumer where userId = '${userId}'
select count(*) from consumer where sellerId = #{sellerId} and status = #{status}
select count(*) from consumer where categoryId = #{cid}
select * from consumer order by id desc
select * from consumer where sellerId = '${sellerId}' order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into consumer (userId, password, name, email, phone, address, detailAddress, createDate) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, now())
mapper.update: update consumer set userId = #{userId}, password = #{password}, address = #{address}, email= #{email}, phone = #{phone}, detailAddress = #{detailAddress}, updateDate = now() where id = #{id}
